ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | #P_errel | |- ( R Er A -> Rel R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_relssdmrn | |- ( Rel R -> R C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) ) |

| 5 |  | #P_errn | |- ( R Er A -> ran R = A ) |

| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_sseqtrd | |- ( R Er A -> R C_ ( A X. A ) ) |
